America Fights Back The LatestTo Our Readers Heres whats making headlines in the United States and overseas today In a newlyreleased videotaped message Osama bin Laden says his agents are carrying out blessed terrorism US officials dismissed his remarks as ludicrous The full minute tape is due to be broadcast today at pm ET Get full coverage at ABCNEWScom sectionsworldDailyNewsSTRIKEbinladentapehtml While Osama bin Laden is still a wanted man military leaders have changed one key element of the hunt US Marines will not conduct a cavetocave search of the Tora Bora mountain region sectionsworldDailyNewsSTRIKEMAINhtml French authorities are reconstructing Richard Reids movements in Paris in the days before he allegedly tried to blow up a transAtlantic flight last week Officials believe the information could lead them to an al Qaeda cell sectionsusDailyNewsairplaneexplosiveshtml Plus Smart YearEnd Tax Moves What To Do Before sectionsGMAGoodMorningAmericaGMATaxesmellodyhobsonhtml ABCNEWScom Up to the Moment Up to You tm You received this mail because you subscribed via ABCNEWScom If you would like to stop receiving these mailings log into our mailcenter at unsubscribe Please do not respond to this mail Questions or comments can be submitted at servicehelpabccontacthtml

America Fights Back The LatestTo Our Readers ABCNEWScom has the latest on whats making headlines in the United States and around the world The new government of Afghanistan will commit as many as troops to aid the United States in its search for Osama bin Laden and members of al Qaeda the deputy defense minister said today sectionsworldDailyNewsSTRIKEMAINhtml The fuses for the explosives authorities say were in the shoes worn by Richard Reid on a transAtlantic flight may have been too moist to light preventing the man from carrying out a suspected plot to blow up the plane Reid is due in federal court in Boston today for a detention hearing where federal prosecutors are expected to ask that he be held without bail sectionsusDailyNewsairplaneexplosiveshtml ABCNEWScom wishes you and your family a happy and healthy new year The year will forever be remembered for one day Sept In a moment the world shook and life as Americans had known it changed forever ABCNEWScom takes a look back at that defining day and the other headlines from sectionsusDailyNewsYEsubindexhtml ABCNEWScom Up to the Moment Up to You tm You received this mail because you subscribed via ABCNEWScom If you would like to stop receiving these mailings log into our mailcenter at unsubscribe Please do not respond to this mail Questions or comments can be submitted at servicehelpabccontacthtml
